# 动态超图操作测试文件
# 格式: operation_type [parameters...]
# 支持的操作:
# add_vertex vertex_id
# delete_vertex vertex_id  
# modify_vertex vertex_id new_label
# add_edge vertex1,vertex2,vertex3
# delete_edge edge_id
# modify_edge edge_id vertex1,vertex2,vertex3
# add_vertex_to_edge edge_id vertex_id
# remove_vertex_from_edge edge_id vertex_id

# 添加新顶点
add_vertex 100
add_vertex 101
add_vertex 102

# 添加新超边
add_edge 100,101,102
add_edge 50,51,52,53

# 修改顶点标签
modify_vertex 10 5
modify_vertex 20 6

# 修改超边
modify_edge 0 1,2,3,4
modify_edge 1 10,11,12

# 向超边添加顶点
add_vertex_to_edge 2 100
add_vertex_to_edge 3 101

# 从超边移除顶点
remove_vertex_from_edge 4 50
remove_vertex_from_edge 5 51

# 删除超边
delete_edge 10
delete_edge 15

# 删除顶点
delete_vertex 200
delete_vertex 201
